title: How to write a letter to your teacher about your personal learning on communication breakdown - Quora

response.answer_text: Questions..…is this a personal letter you want to write to your teacher, about something that happened to you? If so, then the thing to do is schedule a private appointment with your teacher so you can talk, and they can ask questions and maybe help you. Alternatively, could this be the way your teacher has given an assignment? Asking students to write “a letter" combining personal experience with course/class concepts??? If that is the case, then the thing to do is to do it.

Please check for previous ‘how do I write a letter’ answers rather than simply posting such a question as if you were the only person in the world to have a problem performing a simple task. A letter is a letter. State your purpose, then close. How hard is that?
